entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Outlook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:42 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Outlook 03:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Fog. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
